tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_date DATE,
    repair_details TEXT,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    make VARCHAR(255), 
    model VARCHAR(255), 
    year INT, 
    vin VARCHAR(17) 
 );

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    vehicle_id INT, 
    service_date DATE, 
    repair_detail TEXT, 
    cost DECIMAL(10,2) 
 );

CREATE TABLE parts_used ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    maintenance_record_id INT, 
    part_name VARCHAR(255), 
    quantity INT, 
    cost_per_unit DECIMAL(10,2) 
 );

CREATE TABLE Vehicle ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  brand TEXT, 
  model TEXT, 
  year INT 
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecord ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES Vehicle(id), 
  service_date DATE, 
  repair_details TEXT, 
  cost DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE ServiceHistory ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  maintenance_record_id UUID REFERENCES MaintenanceRecord(id), 
  service_type TEXT, 
  service_details TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE Mechanic ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  name TEXT, 
  specialization TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE MechanicAssignment ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  maintenance_record_id UUID REFERENCES MaintenanceRecord(id), 
  mechanic_id UUID REFERENCES Mechanic(id) 
)
